short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your focus back by making websites aggravatingly slow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I found that traditional blockers based on timers were a little too obvious about reminding me how to turn them off. This "blocker" just makes your internet feel really slow and glitchy when using whatever website you choose.
